title: Reeves says UK has suffered ‘years of economic mismanagement’ in speech preparing ground for tax rises – politics live
summary: The Chancellor emphasizes her commitment to addressing the key concerns of the British people. She criticizes past governments for constraining the UK's potential. Her focus is on implementing policies that unlock opportunities for the nation.

title: European Union to reveal ratings for candidate countries – Europe live
summary: Kaja Kallas is set to provide an update today on the progress of various countries in their efforts to join the European Union. The announcement will focus on the advancements made by these nations in meeting membership criteria. This update is poised to shed light on the future of EU enlargement and candidate countries' statuses.

title: Tax rises ‘inevitable’, thinktank warns, as Reeves updates markets on budget plans – business live
summary: This article provides ongoing updates on current economic and financial developments. It covers market trends, economic indicators, and significant events impacting the financial landscape. Readers can stay informed about emerging issues and their potential implications.

title: Primark owner ABF could split fashion business from food division
summary: The parent company reported a decline in sales and profits, attributing the downturn to increased costs within its sugar and agriculture divisions. This financial challenge comes as the industry grapples with rising expenses. The company's outlook remains uncertain amid these economic pressures.

title: Australians have been promised three free hours of solar power a day. Here’s what you need to know
summary: Customers can take advantage of the new scheme without having solar panels, but they must have a smart meter installed. The program aims to promote energy efficiency and renewable energy benefits. This initiative is an effort to enhance accessibility to sustainable energy solutions for all consumers.
